original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 827: Yt-dlp, Sometimes You Can’t See the Tail
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett chats with Bashonly about yt-dlp, the audio/video downloader that carries the torch from youtube-dl! Why is this a hard problem, and what does the future hold for this swiss-army knife of video downloading? Watch to find out!


https://github.com/bashonly
https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp
https://discord.gg/H5MNcFW63r


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: - yt-dlp: youtube-dlから進化した動画ダウンローダー
body: 今週のFLOSS Weeklyでは、yt-dlpについての対談が行われる。動画ダウンロードの未来を探る内容。
titles: - yt-dlp: youtube-dlから進化した動画ダウンローダー
- Jonathan Bennettが語る、yt-dlpの魅力と課題
- 動画ダウンロードの未来とは？yt-dlpの可能性を探る
- FLOSS Weekly Podcastでのyt-dlpのライブ録音をチェック！
- 使い方ガイド付き！yt-dlpでのオーディオ/ビデオダウンロード方法
